content: Please provide three distinct titles for a Gothic horror short story that revolves around the eerie events and supernatural happenings inside an abandoned and dilapidated estate named "The Haunted Mansion".

Certainly! Here are three distinct titles for your Gothic horror short story:

1. **"Whispers of the Forsaken Manor"**
2. **"Echoes in the Shadows of The Haunted Mansion"**
3. **"The Cursed Secrets of Ravensmoor Estate"**
